title: movie-sagemaker
description: Recommender systems have been used to tailor customer experience on online platforms. Amazon Personalize is a fully-managed service that makes it easy to develop recommender system solutions; it automatically examines the data, performs feature and algorithm selection, optimizes the model based on your data, and deploys and hosts the model for real-time recommendation inference. However, due to unique constraints in some domains, sometimes recommender systems need to be custom-built.
